jekyll-shell-theme

Jekyll Shell Theme is an open source light-weight customizable jekyll theme for your site! You can use it to spice up your personal profiles, project pages or just about anything!

No prior web-dev knowledge is required to use the theme to make a website, just follow the instructions in /read-me to set up your web page and start filling it with hackery content! You can see sone features of the theme in /preview.
